li.a: Webster County Career and Technology Center

p.span: Today the Governor announced that all schools will remain closed for the rest of the school year. Starting on April 20, 2020 the Grab and Go Meal program will start up back up at both elementary schools and new at-home learning packets will be available also on April 20, 2020.

a.span: Click here for "At Home Packets" and additional "At Home resources".

span.span: Today, the Governor of Mississippi has ordered all public schools close until April 17, 2020.
More information will be coming in the future days and weeks.

a.span: Click here for information about Grab N' Go Meals

p.span: WCSD has decided to close all schools for the week of March 16-20 due to the spreading of the Coronavirus. All athletic and extra-curricular events and practices are also canceled for the week of March 16-20. Updates will be provided as they are received.
